TopicTitle: The Space Shuttle 2.0, Just fly naturally

Articles.Content:
The New Space Shuttle

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This shuttle comes with no fancy manual or action groups, it flies without any micromanagement of little stability enhancing rockets or anything complex, boring and unstable

This shuttle is so stable it nearly flies itself!

http://www./download/s0fexh2q7bzphio/Space+Shuttle+2_0.craft

USER MANUAL; READ IT!

FLY IT LIKE YOU SAW IT FLY ON TV/YOUTUBE, DO NOT TRY TO FLY IT ANY OTHER WAY

DO NOT THINK THAT YOU CAN TINKER WITH THE SHUTTLE 2.0, YOU WILL FAIL:sticktongue:

READ THE ACTION GROUP DESCRIPTIONS AND DON'T BE DISAPPOINTED IF YOU FAIL TO USE THEM!

Only 2 action groups

Press 1: to drop the liquid fuelled boosters (near the end of their burn they produce too much thrust so they must be jettisoned)

*this is unavoidable

Press 2: to turn off the Shuttle's main engines

*If the main engines are used when the shuttle is detached from the main tank then the shuttle will spin, the main engines are only designed for use with the external tank

EDIT: Put it in the VAB folder, not the SPH

EDIT 2: I built a new version of this with a cargo bay for anyone who's interested it can be found through this link
